General.Name: Eros Resources Corp
General.Description: Eros Resources Corp. engages in the identification, acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral, and oil and gas resource properties in North America. The company explores for gold, silver, and uranium deposits. Its principal property is the Bell Mountain project, which consists of unpatented mining claims located to the southeast of Reno, Nevada. The company is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
